english.segment1: Tears are falling, hearts are breaking. How we need to hear from God. You've been promised, we've been waiting
english.segment2: Welcome Holy Child. Welcome Holy Child
english.segment3: Hope that you don't mind our manger. How I wish we would have known. But long-awaited Holy Stranger. Make Yourself at home. Please make Yourself at home. Bring Your peace into our violence. Bid our hungry souls be filled. Word now breaking Heaven's silence
english.segment4: Welcome to our world. Welcome to our world
english.segment5: Fragile finger sent to heal us. Tender brow prepared for thorn. Tiny heart whose blood will save us. Unto us is born. Unto us is born. So wrap our injured flesh around You. Breathe our air and walk our sod. Rob our sin and make us holy
english.segment6: Perfect Son of God. Perfect Son of God. Welcome to our world
